attributes.action: push forward for the re-instalment of national service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition will allow the government to see how happy the British citizens are currently with the youth culture & low Morales that today’s youth appear to have, discipline & control needs to be installed or we are on our way to becoming a group of ill-educated, poorly skilled & totally un-morale nation of underachiever's! Violent crime appears to be on the increase in Britain & seem's to involve teenagers, often from underprivileged minority communities, with children as young as 11 known to be carrying weapons. Violence seems to have become an intrinsic part of an increasingly troubled teenage culture in Britain. Disruptive youth’s,need to be controlled & have discipline installed in them so that they themselves are proud to make the decisions that are right for themselves, other's & the nation on a whole This is "GREAT BRITAIN" it would be "AMAZING BRITAIN" if it wasn’t for these pulling the average down! National service, the discipline & morale’s this country needs!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
